鬼坊主鱚: (オニボウズギス) - black swallower (Chiasmodon niger)
鬼女: (きじょ) - demoness/witch/ogress/she-devil; (joc) (pun on 既女)  married woman
鬼婆: (おにばばあ) - hag; witch; bitch; penurious or spiteful old woman; termagant; virago
鬼嫁: (おによめ) - cruel wife; termagant wife; wife from hell
鬼子: (おにっこ) - child born with teeth; child which does not resemble its parents/changeling; wild child/badly-behaved child
鬼子母神: (きしぼじん) - Hariti (goddess of childbirth and children)
鬼宿: (きしゅく) - {astron} (sometimes read たまをのぼし or たまほめぼし)  Chinese "ghost" constellation (one of the 28 mansions); "day of the ghost"
鬼宿日: (きしゅくにち) - "day of the ghost" (an extremely auspicious day on the lunar calendar for everything but weddings)
鬼星: (おにぼし) - Chinese "ghost" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
鬼札: (おにふだ) - wildcard (in hanafuda); blank card
鬼板: (おにいた) - wooden board used on the ridge-ends of a roof instead of an onigawara tile (sometimes covered in copper sheeting)
鬼殺し: (おにごろし) - strong sake; firewater; rotgut
鬼気迫る: (ききせまる) - (usu. modifying a noun) to be bloodcurdling; to be ghastly
鬼灯: (ホオズキ) - ground cherry (Physalis alkekengi var. franchetii); husk tomato; Chinese lantern plant
鬼理死丹: (キリシタン) - early Japanese Christianity (from the later Muromachi period) (por: cristao); early Japanese Christian
鬼瓦: (おにがわら) - decorative ridge-end tile (traditionally bearing the face of a demon and resembling a gargoyle); hideous face
鬼田平子: (オニタビラコ) - Oriental false hawksbeard (Youngia japonica)
鬼百合: (おにゆり) - tiger lily (East Asian plant, Lilium lancifolium)
鬼皮: (おにかわ) - hard shell of a nut, etc.
鬼籍に入る: (きせきにいる) - to pass away; to join the majority
鬼糸巻エイ: (おにいとまきエイ) - manta ray; Manta birostris
鬼胎: (きたい) - (鬼胎 only) anxiety/concern/(secret) fear; (esp. 奇胎)  (hydatidiform) mole
鬼草: (オニクサ) - Gelidium japonicum (species of seaweed)
鬼菱: (オニビシ) - water caltrop (Trapa natans); water chestnut; caltrop
鬼蜘蛛: (オニグモ) - Araneus ventricosus (species of orb-weaving spider)
鬼蜻蜓: (オニヤンマ) - Siebold's dragonfly (Anotogaster sieboldii); jumbo dragonfly
鬼課長: (おにかちょう) - unsympathetic manager; section chief with a heart of stone
鬼退治: (おにたいじ) - chasing out ogres; exterminating ogres
鬼達磨虎魚: (オニダルマオコゼ) - reef stonefish (Synanceia verrucosa); stonefish; devilfish
鬼達磨鰧: (オニダルマオコゼ) - reef stonefish (Synanceia verrucosa); stonefish; devilfish
鬼郭公: (オニカッコウ) - Asian koel (Eudynamys scolopacea)
鬼野芥子: (オニノゲシ) - prickly sow-thistle (Sonchus asper); sharp-fringed sow thistle; spiny sow thistle; spiny-leaved sow thistle
鬼門: (kimon) - a direção nordeste (azarada), pessoa ou coisa a ser evitada; ponto fraco, calcanhar de Aquiles
鬼面: (きめん) - mask of a devil; startling appearance; devil's face
鬼面仏心: (きめんぶっしん) - (yoji) having the face of a devil and the heart of Buddha; having a stern face but a tender heart
鬼面伝心: (きめんでんしん) - of a fearsome countenance, but kind as a Buddha
鬼頭: (おにがしら) - decorative black flagpole tassel made from tail hair (of a yak, horse, ox, etc.) or dyed hemp
鬼鼠: (オニネズミ) - greater bandicoot rat (Bandicota indica)
魁: (かい) - Avançando à Frente dos Outros
魂を入れ替える: (たましいをいれかえる) - to turn over a new leaf; to reform (oneself)
魂不死説: (たましいふしせつ) - (theory of) the immortality of the soul
魂消る: (たまげる) - (derived from たまきえる) to be astonished; to be startled; to be appalled
魂祭: (たままつり) - ceremony honouring the spirits of ancestors (esp. the Bon festival)
魂祭り: (たままつり) - ceremony honouring the spirits of ancestors (esp. the Bon festival)
魂緒の星: (たまおのほし) - {astron}  Chinese "ghost" constellation (one of the 28 mansions); "day of the ghost"
魂胆: (kontan) - motivo oculto, plano, esquema; circunstâncias complicadas, complexidades
魂讃め星: (たまほめぼし) - {astron}  Chinese "ghost" constellation (one of the 28 mansions); "day of the ghost"
魂迎え: (たまむかえ) - welcoming the spirits of the dead
魂迎え鳥: (たまむかえどり) - lesser cuckoo (Cuculus poliocephalus)
魂送り: (たまおくり) - sending off the spirits of the dead
魅かれる: (ひかれる) - to be charmed by; to be attracted to; to be taken with; to be drawn to
魅す: (ばかす) - to bewitch; to confuse; to enchant; to delude
魅する: (みする) - to charm; to bewitch; to enchant; to captivate; to fascinate
魅せられる: (みせられる) - to be enchanted; to be charmed
魅入る: (みいる) - (usu. used in the passive voice) to entrance; to possess; to enthrall
魅力的: (みりょくてき) - charming; fascinating; attractive
魅力的機能: (みりょくてききのう) - desirable feature
魅惑的: (みわくてき) - charming; fascinating; enchanting; bewitching; beguiling; captivating; alluring
魍魎: (もうりょう) - all kinds of spirits and goblins
魏晋南北朝時代: (ぎしんなんぼくちょうじだい) - Wei, Jin, and Southern and Northern Dynasties period (220-589 CE)
魑魅魍魎: (ちみもうりょう) - (yoji) evil spirits of rivers and mountains
魔: (ma) - bruxa, demônio, diabo, espírito maligno, influência maléfica; alguém que (habitualmente) realiza algum ato (negativo)
魔が差す: (まがさす) - to be possessed by an evil spirit; to be tempted; to give in to an urge; to succumb to temptation
魔よけ: (まよけ) - charm against evil spirits; talisman; amulet
魔乳: (まにゅう) - witch's milk (milk secreted by some neonates)
魔処: (ましょ) - location where a magical being resides; cursed place where disaster after disaster occurs
